content: Hey, everyone! It's been an interesting year. It's really inspiring to know that people around the world use Timer.Coffee for their brews. I will continue to add more features in the next year, to make the app better for all of us. This update adds a brilliant [Tetsu Kasuya 4:6 Method for V60](app:///recipes/hario_v60/106), don't forget to check it out! If you like the app, [donations](app:///donate) are always welcome! Wish you amazing holidays and great brews! ☕️
